eml.P:
function dAtt = dAtt(DCMest, DCMnom)
dAtt = DCMest*DCMnom';

function dw = werr(wnom, wtrue)
dw = wtrue - wnom;

function RxnWheelRate = Rxn_Wheel_Rates(wbody, Jsat, K, Cw, Edot, E, Wrxn)
RxnWheelRate = Jsat*K(1)*E/Cw + Jsat*K(2)*Edot/Cw - cross(wbody, Wrxn);

function RxnAngMom = Rxn_Ang_Mom(Cw, wrxn)
RxnAngMom = Cw*wrxn;

function dHrxn = AngMomRate(Cw, dwrxn)
dHrxn = Cw*dwrxn;
